case.title: in search of intimacy and cuddling... - 27 (your place)
case.text: one smart, fun, bbw seeks an equally smart and fun man for intimacy and cuddle time a couple nights a week. let's have dinner or drinks, watch tv, talk to each other and then spoon one another to sleep. you must be okay with my horrible snoring and be bi-spoonable (big or little, depending on my mood). let's take all the best parts of a relationship without the lame stuff. give me a rundown of yourself - age, interests, favorite band or book suggestions, and go from there...your picture gets mine.
